Product Description: 100% Extraction, Whole Grain Spelt Flour. With a sweet, nutty flavor profile and soft, tender texture, Spelt can fit into any baking category. Our favorite things to bake with Spelt include Banana Bread, Brownies, Zucchini Bread and Carrot Cake.\n\n

Freshly milled Whole Rye Flour. California grown heirloom Abruzzi Rye. It's beautifully aromatic flour with notes of malt, hay and tea leaves. Use it to make seedy European style 100% rye loaves, as part of a bread flour blend, or for your next favorite pan of brownies - no white flour necessary for the brownies, just whole rye!\n\n
1 1/2 pounds polenta milled from California-sourced, non-GMO yellow corn. Truly special flavor and character.

It's Back!! Currently milling heirloom pink corn. Its soft, delicate texture and rich roasted and candied aromatics make it irresistible. A stunner which sells out as quickly as we can mill the small amount we receive each year. Replace conventional cornmeal in your recipes with this variety and prepare to be wowed by tenderness and depth of flavor.

9-inch oval banneton. Accommodates up to 1.5 lbs of dough, or a 500g flour recipe. Top rim dimensions: 9.25” wide, 3.5” tall.
European-made 8" round banneton. Accomodates up to 1.5# of dough, or a 500g flour recipe. Top rim dimensions: 8.25” wide, 4” tall. Not ovenproof!
Unbleached cotton flour sack towel with our Grist & Toll logo. Perfect for lining bannetons or covering bread bowl while proofing.
100% cotton, American made.
3 of the Miller's favorite flours of the season, plus our heavy duty tote bag and a few recipes to get you started.

Everything you need for a strong sourdough game, including our dehydrated starter with instructions for reviving and feeding.
2 1/2 lbs Hard Red and Hard White whole wheat flours, banneton + liner, Danish dough whisk, flour sack towel,  our favorite sourdough starter container
*Ships in its own gift box
**Banneton will be either 8" round or 9" oval, depending on availability. Both hold the same amount of dough.

Everything you'll need for reviving our dehydrated whole grain sourdough starter at home, just add water: dehydrated starter culture, whole rye for feeding it, our favorite starter container, a Danish dough whisk plus instructions.

2.5 lbs of Whole Grain Triticale - a hybrid of Hard Red Wheat and Rye.\n\nWe are currently milling a small sample batch from the UC Davis Triticale trials, UCD3131 - this particular line showed better than average baking strength and a mellow flavor profile. Very limited supply.

100% Extraction (100% whole wheat) French Renan flour. Custom and organically grown for us in Northern California, this French red wheat is one of the most delicious you will ever taste. It's gluten strength is a little more mellow, but we still love it for sourdough artisan bread (do not over-hydrate!), lamination and enriched breads, as well as most pastries.
2.5 Lbs

2.5 lbs of 100% Extraction (100% Whole Grain) Khorasan flour. Khorasan is an ancient wheat variety from the durum family: golden colored with a buttery flavor profile. Bake with it as you would its relatives: Emmer and Durum.

Product Name: Bread Class: The G&T Sourdough Loaf
Product Description: Saturday, May 31st, 2025 from 10:00am to 3:00pm We will take you through all the steps of making a 100% whole grain Grist & Toll sourdough loaf of bread, from feeding the starter to scoring and baking. You will leave with active, ripe starter, a new banneton and liner,  and your own loaf to be cold-proofed and baked at home the next morning. Did you become a quarantine baker? Made a few loaves but need a little expert help? We're here to get your sourdough baking back on track! Bring your own apron to wear. All other class materials will be supplied by G&T. Skill Level: Some knowledge and experience working with sourdough starter preferred, but beginners are welcome. Includes: Banneton and Liner Whole grain sourdough bread tasting Snacks *Once purchased, tickets are non-refundable *Please bring a cooler and ice packs if driving from far away to protect your unbaked loaf on its journey home. Unless otherwise noted, all G&T classes are for ages 18+ Class location is Grist & Toll: 990 S. Arroyo Pkwy, Ste 1, Pasadena, CA 91105

100% natural cotton, pre-shrunk, machine washable banneton liner. Custom made to fit over the sides and down into the bottom of your banneton, to cradle your dough during final proof and prevent sticking.
Select from 2 sizes:
8-inch round banneton liner
9-inch oval banneton liner

Product Name: Bread  Class: Soft 100% Whole Grain Sandwich Loaf
Product Description: Saturday, June 7th, 2025 from 10:00am to 3:00pm In this hands-on class you will learn how to make our favorite, soft, 100% whole grain sandwich loaf. Also known as The Approachable Loaf, the formula was developed at the WSU Bread Lab as a way to show the world how tender and delicious a whole grain bread can be. This recipe is what we would call a hybrid - making use of both your sourdough starter and commercial dried yeast. Same day mix and bake keeps flavor profiles sweeter and more mellow. Once purchased, all Grist & Toll classes are nonrefundable. *Knowledge of how to feed, maintain and bake with a sourdough starter is a prerequisite for this class. While we will answer any questions related to the class recipes, we will jump right in to mixing and will not cover the basics of sourdough maintenance. Light snacks will be provided Students will take home their own Approachable loaf. Students will be able to shop for flour and our other supplies while attending class. Please bring your own apron. All other materials will be supplied by G&T. Unless otherwise stated, G&T classes are for ages 18+.

A selection of our favorite things for the experienced sourdough bread baker, including
5 lbs each Hard Red and Hard White whole wheat flours, proofing banneton + liner, scoring lame, Danish dough whisk, flour sack towel and our best whole grain sourdough bread formulas.
*Ships in its own gift box

This set makes a compelling  argument in favor of eating pancakes for breakfast, lunch and dinner, not just on the weekends! Set includes: 2 1/2 pounds each Sonora and Spelt flours, Zoar Tapatree maple syrup (life changing!), a jar of preserves, and the definitive booklet on all things pancake authored by Amy Halloran\n*Ships in its own gift box, not wrapped\n**Jam may change seasonally

Give the gift of everyone's favorite cookie - Chocolate Chip - upgraded with a selection of our favorite cookie flours and chocolate. See which combo you like best! Set includes:
2 1/2 pounds each Sonora, French Renan and Rye whole grain flours
TCHO Chocolate Sweet n Sassy discs

The greatest chocolate chip cookie recipe

Our Pie Making gift set includes our most special components for mouth watering results. Set includes:
Bespoke Purple Heart rolling pin
2 1/2 pounds each Sonora and Spelt flours (our pie crust faves!)
2 Jars American Spoon pie filling preserves
Grist & Toll flaky pie dough recipe
*Preserves are either Sour Cherry or Blueberry, based on availability
**This set ships in a special box which cannot be gift wrapped

100% white whole wheat India-Jammu flour. Available in 2.5# and 5# bags.\nIndia-Jammu is a landrace wheat and one of Monica Spiller's selections for California grain growers. As a hard white wheat, it is one of the few landrace wheat varieties planted that has comparable baking strength to some of the modern bread wheat varieties. Use as a stand alone flour for sourdough bread, pizza and pasta, but please also incorporate into your pastry baking as well. The lighter color and flavor is suitable for almost anything.\n*HEADS UP this wheat is thirsty! Our best 100% India Jammu sourdough loaves have been at 100% hydration.
25 Lbs

2.5 pounds of whole wheat durum flour. Traditionally, durum wheat is the pasta wheat. However, we love it for focaccia (100%) flatbreads and as a percentage of a flour blend for bread. Typically, we max out at 30% durum but there are many regional European recipes that call for durum flour. This is a whole durum flour, not semolina - semolina is a sifted or refined flour.

Join Nan for our very first group excursion! Saturday, June 14th from 8:30am - 1:30pm.
We'll meet at the Saturday Pasadena farmers market to select fresh fruit, veg and herbs, then rendez-vous back at Grist & Toll for a hands on sourdough flatbread decorating and baking class. We'll eat Nan's demo breads together at the end of class and each student will take their edible artwork home to enjoy.

*Once purchased, tickets to all Grist & Toll baking classes are nonrefundable.
*Knowledge of feeding and maintaining a sourdough starter is a prerequisite for this class.
*Unless stated, all Grist & Toll classes are for ages 18+
*If desired, please bring your own apron. All other materials and ingredients will be provided by Grist & Toll.

1.5# finely milled buckwheat flour\nGrist & Toll buckwheat flour is finer and softer than most commercial brands because we only mill de-hulled buckwheat groats. Use this beauty for crepes, noodles, brownies, cookies or as a small part of a flour blend for bread. You will love the flour's delicate texture and sesame/tahini flavor profile.

2.5 pounds of mixed whole wheat flour\nField Blend is made from the flour collection bucket that rests under the mill as we shift between mill runs of different grains each week. It's a completely random but delicious little bag of flour, perfect for weekend pancakes or as a small percentage of a bread flour blend. We mill at least 6 different types of grain each week, so the blend can include Hard Red, Hard White, Sonora, Spelt and Rye.

Product Name: Bread Class: Whole Wheat Pan Loaf, Commercial Yeast
Product Description:
All bakers need to have a standard 100% whole grain sandwich bread in their repertoire. This class takes us back to the fundamentals of Bread 101, but through the lens of stone milled whole grain flour.

In this hands-on class, we will mix and bake 100% whole grain loaves using commercial dried yeast. Don't be deceived by this seemingly simple concept. At the heart of this class, we'll still be covering bakers math, hydration percentages, time and temperature, and how to adjust bread formulas for different grains or different flour blends.

Once purchased, all Grist & Toll classes are nonrefundable.

Please bring your own apron to class. All other tools and materials will be provided by Grist & Toll.

Product Name: Baking Class: 100% Whole Wheat Puff Pastry
Product Description: Friday, June 6th, 2025 from 10:00am to 3:00pm. Think you can't make delectable, delicate puff pastry from whole wheat flour? Think again. This class is going to blow your mind. In this hands-on class you will learn how to choose the right whole grain flour for the job and the basics of folding dough to create layers, turning you into a true chef pâtissier! We're going to take the fear away by introducing you to some basic techniques and recipes that result in buttery, flaky goodness and ease you into the lamination process. Working exclusively with whole grain flour requires some important adjustments. Bring your own apron, rolling pin and your appetite! We'll be tasting everything. All other supplies and materials will be provided by G&T. Open to bakers of all skill levels. *Once purchased, G&T class admission is nonrefundable. *Unless otherwise stated, all G&T classes are for ages 18+ Class location: Grist & Toll, 990 S Arroyo Pkwy, Ste 1, Pasadena, CA 91105

Focaccia is something that should be in every baker's repertoire. It's fluffy on the inside, crispy on the outside and delicious on its own, topped with veg or sliced horizontally to fill with your favorite sandwich components. In this hands-on class you will learn a hybrid formula, which uses both sourdough starter and a pinch of commercial yeast.

*Knowledge of feeding and maintaining a sourdough starter is a prerequisite for this class.
*Once purchased, G&T class admission is nonrefundable
*Bring your own apron and an appetite - we'll be snacking and baking throughout the class
Class location is Grist & Toll: 990 S Arroyo Pkwy, Ste 1, Pasadena, CA 91105

Saturday, June 21st, 2025 from 10:00am to 3:00pm. In this hands-on baking class you will learn how to make your own pita bread using a hybrid formula with both sourdough starter and a smidge of commercial yeast. The formula we'll use is based off of one of L.A.'s hottest Middle Eastern restaurants in DTLA - Bavel. The recipe and technique holds some surprises, the greatest of which is how undeniably superior these are than anything you can buy in the supermarket. You will never be able to return to store-bought and we're not sorry about that. *Once purchased, G&T class admission is nonrefundable. *Bring your own apron and appetite. We'll be eating pita and lots of meze. Class location is Grist & Toll: 990 S Arroyo Pkwy, Ste 1, Pasadena, CA 91105

Friday, October 10th from 9:00am to 3:00pm The holy grail of baking classes, 100% whole wheat croissants, will be happening at Grist & Toll. Join Nan and California Wheat Commission lab director, Teng Vang, for a totally hands-on class where you will make croissants from start to finish. Each student will mix, laminate, shape, proof, bake and take home their own batch of Grist & Toll whole wheat croissants. While open to bakers of all skill levels, a heads up that this would not be considered a beginners class. Once purchased, Grist & Toll class admission is non-refundable. Unless stated otherwise, Grist & Toll classes are for ages 18+ Class location is Grist & Toll: 990 S. Arroyo Parkway, Ste 1 Pasadena, CA 91105
